subject: Pro X Ultra pedals
description_text:
Hey I ordered the pro x pedals on September 13th and was wondering when they would be shipping?

Order #SSN2645

Thank you for your time, 
Justin 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi ​Justin​,    We sincerely apologise for not informing you sooner that our Pro X Ultra is currently out of stock at our US warehouse. Your order has only just been dispatched today, and we regret any inconvenience caused. The base plate encountered delays at customs and is now scheduled for dispatch the day after tomorrow.

Ok no worries, thank you for the update 
Sent from my iPhone

>

Do you by chance know the day the baseplate will be delivered? Thank you for your time 
Sent from my iPhone

>

Sorry for all the emails, but I can’t find the control box in the box that the pedals came in and the tape on the box was cut (guessing due to customs checking it). 
Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi J. c. m. ky. 1992,    Please provide us with a photo so we can confirm what items are missing. Additionally, we are about to enter an 8-day holiday period, so we may need to arrange for a replacement after the holiday.

From what I can tell the only things missing would be the control module with the usb for it and the baseplate. 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi J. cm ky. 1992,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have already reshipped the missing parts. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF3283345462533
Thank you, you guys are awesome! Sent from my iPhone
Do you know when the control module will arrive? The second box was the base plate but without a control module I can’t use it to my knowledge. Sent from my iPhone

My apologies for the incorrect information provided earlier. This is the correct logistics tracking link for your parcel, which is expected to arrive around the 18th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045962731076
